amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Emergency Management Performance Grant program by $40 million; and increase funding for the SAFECOM program office by $10.3 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) for Emergency Management Performance Grants by $40,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pascrell amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 227 (Roll no. 217).
